page.title: 15WEST COKER AREA RELIGION
page.content: WEST COKER CHURCH-ST. MARTIN OF TOURS THIS DATES BACK TO THE 14TH.CENTURY,IT HAS A HORN WINDOW IN THE TOWER,THIS IS A WINDOW MADE OF COWS HORN HEATED AND ROLLED UNTIL IT IS THIN AND TRANSPARENT EAST CHINNOCK PARISH CHURCH HAS FINE EXAMPLES OF MODERN STAINED GLASS,WHICH WERE PRESENTED TO THE CHURCH BY A GERMAN GLASS MAKER WHO WAS A PRISONER OF WAR IN THIS AREA, AND WHO WISHED TO THANK THE LOCAL PEOPLE FOR THEIR KINDNESS TO HIM AND FOR THE SPIRITUAL COMFORT WHICH THE CHURCH GAVE HIM AT THE TIME.
